answers.answer: It sounds like erythema nodosum! Have his doctor take a look at it.
I honesty dont know maybe you should see your local doctor.

They sound like Ganglion cysts.  They usually will subside on their on.How long has he had them?I doubt if this is r/t his Diabetes or high blood pressure.Definitely should have these checked/assessed.

question: My husband  is 73 years old and he has developed knots the size of half dollar's on his lower shins. Is this anything to worry about. He is a borderline diabetic and is on blood pressure medication?
title: domestic housewife
